article_title: Moncton doctors say Horizon Health has enough staff, supplies to deal with pandemic
article_description: Horizon Health doctors say the province started preparing a response to a pandemic after the SARS outbreak in Toronto in 2001
article_content: Lead doctors at Horizon Health Network say the organization has enough supplies and staff to deal with the coronavirus pandemic Dr  Ken Gillespie  chief of staff at the Moncton Hospital  told reporters on Friday that after the SARS outbreak in 2003  every    5256 chars
